## Problem 1 

```{r, pols_month}
pols_month_df = 
  read_csv("fte_data/pols-month.csv") |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> #clean the dataset
  separate(mon, into = c("year", "month", "day")) |> #breakup mon into integer variables
  mutate(
    month = #replace month number with month name 
      case_match( 
        month, 
        "01" ~ "January",
        "02" ~ "Feburary",
        "03" ~ "March",
        "04" ~ "April",
        "05" ~ "May",
        "06" ~ "June",
        "07" ~ "July",
        "08" ~ "August",
        "09" ~ "September",
        "10" ~ "October",
        "11" ~ "November",
        "12" ~ "December")
  )
```

```{r, snp}
snp_df = 
  read_csv("fte_data/snp.csv") |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  separate(date, into = c("month", "day", "year")) |> 
mutate(
    month = #replace month number with month name 
      case_match( 
        month, 
        "1" ~ "January",
        "2" ~ "Feburary",
        "3" ~ "March",
        "4" ~ "April",
        "5" ~ "May",
        "6" ~ "June",
        "7" ~ "July",
        "8" ~ "August",
        "9" ~ "September",
        "10" ~ "October",
        "11" ~ "November",
        "12" ~ "December")
  )
  select(snp_df, year, month, close)
```
